version_description:
√穩定性改進。

如果您有應用程序的任何問題，在support@honkhonkpunch.com給我發電子郵件。

我想保持魔術橡皮擦免費的所有功能，並可以通過編寫審查的幫助。我真的很感激每一個。

謝謝，

艾倫Cushway

√穩定性改進。

如果您有應用程序的任何問題，在support@honkhonkpunch.com給我發電子郵件。

我想保持魔術橡皮擦免費的所有功能，並可以通過編寫審查的幫助。我真的很感激每一個。

謝謝，

艾倫Cushway

Edit and save at full photo resolution (iPhone 5s or newer, or iPad Air or newer)

If you have any issues don't hesitate to contact us at support@honkhonkpunch.com.

Keep those reviews coming!
◉ Bug Fixes

◉ Added support for 15 new languages
◉ UX improvements
◉ Improved the speed of the magic wand tool
◉ 20 levels of Undo (used to be 10)
◉ Fixed some bugs in Undo
◉ Minor UX improvements
◉ Other bug fixes

If you have any problems or

◉ New photo picker
◉ UI improvements

If you have any problems please let me know at support@honkhonknpunch.com.

◉ Minor tweaks

If you have any problems please let me know at support@honkhonknpunch.com.

• Update for iPhone X
• Fixed issue where you could lose work if you swiped from the left side of the screen
• Minor bug fixes

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• You can now change the background to black, white or checker while erasing. This makes it much easier to see anything you have missed.

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• On the save screen you can now change the background color if saving as JPG

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• On the save screen you can now add a background image (press the "Edit Background" button)

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Added an RGB editor to the background editor. Now you can enter your RGB codes and save a color palette.
• iPad now works in portrait or landscape

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fixed issue where the background image was warped when using a different canvas shape. Sorry about that.
• Minor improvements

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Minor bug fixes

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Added pattern backgrounds
• New Shadow tool for premium users
• Improved behaviour of soft edge brushes
• Added square and triangular brushes for premium users

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkp

• Fix crash issue after crop for some users
• Fix issue where some photos would load at low resolution

-- Previously --
• Added pattern backgrounds
• New Shadow tool for premium users
• Improved behaviour of soft edge brushes
• Added

• Improved the edges when erasing with fast finger motion

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Minor Bug Fixes

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Improved photo picker performance
• Changed to landscape orientation for iPad users

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Added an RGB editor to the background editor. Now you can enter your RGB codes and save a color palette.
• iPad now works in portrait or landscape

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Minor improvements

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix an issue some people were seeing where a PNG save would still have a white background on iOS 13

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix another issue where a PNG save would still have a white background. I really think I've got it this time. Let me know if you still get the issue...

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix yet another issue where a PNG save would still have a white background. I really think I've got it this time. Let me know if you still get the issue...

• New home screen
• UI improvements

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Save screen -> New now takes you back to the photo picker where you left off. This replaces the home button and should be a better workflow.

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix an issue with the previous release
